definitions.definition: The act of running away from home with a paramour .
The act of running away secretly for the purpose of getting married .
The act of running away from home (for any reason).
The act of a person with dementia wandering away from the area where they are safe .

main_definition: The act of running away from home with a paramour .
secondary_definitions: The act of running away secretly for the purpose of getting married .
The act of running away from home (for any reason).
( pathology ) The act of a person with dementia wandering away from the area where they are safe .
